narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bn Medicine PC is a Clinic/Center, Primary Care provider based in New York, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $52.0M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $52.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
